item.title: Install Apache Tomcat Server on Mac using Brew
item.description: Brew is a package manager tool for macOS, like apt for Ubuntu. Install Tomcat Server In this article, we just install apache tomcat 8. # Install tomcat version 8 brew install tomcat@8 This will take care of the downloading, installation, configuration of tomcat and manager the dependencies as well. By default, Homebrew will install the package into the /usr/local/Cellar directory. You can check it: # check the location brew ls tomcat@8 # You get like these: /usr/local/Cellar/tomcat@8/8.
